articles.title: Tanzania Declares Marburg Outbreak: Africa CDC Mobilizes Immediate Response - africacdc.org
articles.description: ADDIS ABABA, January 20, 2025 – Tanzania has declared a Marburg virus disease (MVD) outbreak after confirming one case and identifying 25 suspected cases in the Kagera Region of Northwestern Tanzania. The Marburg virus, a highly infectious and often fatal dis…
